text.div:
Medical Reason Androgen Deprivation Therapy Not Administered or Prescribed

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G9895 Documentation of medical reason(s) for not prescribing/administering androgen deprivation therapy in combination with external beam radiotherapy to the prostate (e.g., salvage therapy)

name: Medical Reason Androgen Deprivation Therapy Not Administered or Prescribed
